summary:
The Heaven Chest is located within the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood. It is a small chest located onthe table in the corner bedroom. 

You need Dawnguard patch to run this mod.
descriptionHtml:
The Heaven Chest is located within the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood. It is a small chest located onthe table in the corner bedroom. 

It includes: 

Bow of Heaven - Fire x 2 (Enchantment - Burns the target for 30 points, Targets on fire take extra damage) 
Heaven Fire Arrow x 10000 (Damage - 50) 
Heaven Shield x 2 (Enchantment - Increases Fire Resistance by 70%) 
Heaven Sword x 2 (Enchantment - Burns the target for 30 points, Targets on fire take extra damage)

Heaven Corset (Heavy) x 2 (Enchantment - Increases Heavy Arnor skill by 25 points) 
Heaven Corset (Light) x 2 (Enchantment - Increases Light Arnor skill by 25 points) 
Heaven Helmet (Heavy) x 2 (Enchantment - Bows do 40% more damage) 
Heaven Helmet (Light) x 2 (Enchantment - Bows do 40% more damage) 
Heaven Boots (Heavy) x 2 (Enchantment - Sneaking is 40% better) 
Heaven Boots (Light) x 2 (Enchantment - Sneaking is 40% better) 
Heaven Gaunlets (Heavy) x 2 (Enchantment - One-handed attacks do 40% more damage) 
Heaven Gaunlets (Light) x 2 (Enchantment - One-handed attacks do 40% more damage) 

Spell Tome: Heavens Chest x 1 (Access your chest from anywhere in Skyrim)` 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

You need Dawnguard patch to run this mod.
author: Matthew Reap
